overview: In this documentary about friendship and perseverance, three young transgender women from El Salvador and Honduras go on a 2,400-mile journey with the high-profile migrant caravan. These women, strangers at the outset and fleeing extortion, discrimination, and abusive relationships, endure hardship as they slowly make their way to the US, teaming up with other trans girls along the route and integrating with the caravanâ€™s LGBTQ community.
tagline: ON A QUEST TO FIND ACCEPTANCE AND HAPPINESS
title: The Right Girls
